title: Boo

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Haunt**: Scare someone, Roleblocking them and muting them the next day, Can't be used on the same person twice in a row.
- **Possess**: Control a player at Day, When night arrives, You will learn their role and do their night action for them. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are visited by your target when Haunting them, your ability fails.
- Players will learn they were possessed at night start, You may not do your action if possessing someone.
